name: Toilet Paper of the Corona Pandemic
name_original: Toilet Paper of the Corona Pandemic
description:
A short entry of our game for the 8 hours SAE BERLIN JAM in 2020. 

The theme was 1 Button Pressing and we decided to sarcastic replicate a "What if" situation in Germany during the first breakout of the Corona Pandemic

Hope you enjoy and show me yours highscore under the comment section below!!!

Credits:

Programmers: João, Kristián, Hoang

Artist: AQIL
